# async_structured_agent

The `AsyncStructuredAgent` module for creating async agents with structured responses.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/async_structured_agent/index" symbolName="AsyncStructuredStream" /> AsyncStructuredStream

An asynchronous stream of partial structured outputs from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/async_structured_agent/index" symbolName="Response" /> Response

The response generated by an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/async_structured_agent/index" symbolName="Dataclass" /> Dataclass

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/async_structured_agent/index" symbolName="BaseStructuredAgent" /> BaseStructuredAgent

Structured agent class for generating structured responses using LLMs with tools.

## <ApiType type="Class" path="agents/async_structured_agent/index" symbolName="AsyncStructuredAgent" /> AsyncStructuredAgent

Asynchronous structured agent class for generating structured responses using LLMs with tools.
